| History                 = Globally Branded Content.com was a company that was owned by [[Lester Verde (Earth-616)|Dr. Bong]] and financed by [[Kenneth Flogg (Earth-616)|Kenneth Flogg]] to create the perfect boy-band. They grew them in vats in the building and use middle-aged gay men to check if their target demographic of teenage girls liked them. Those that did not measure up were converted back to genetic material. [[Beverly Switzler (Earth-616)|Beverly Switzler]] was hired and made supervisor so Dr. Bong could win her back; however, after she and [[Howard the Duck (Earth-791021)|Howard the Duck]] found out, Dr. Bong focused on killing Howard, setting the building ablaze, and turning Howard into a mouse in his attempt.{{r|Howard the Duck Vol 3 1}}
